channel.title: [PI] Clipped following
channel.description:
I've followed the clipped following tut [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,527173.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,527173.0.html[/url]
-Added all files in the correct place -Changed the package and imports to work properly -Fixed the errors I had -Added the new files to the compiler
But the following still isn't clipped. I tried my best solving it myself, but I don't know what's wrong? I think I am missing some piece of code but I have no clue what.. The players just go through fences, doors, buildings, etc.
I'm using a 317 PI, nothing special.
Anyone who has a clue what's missing?
Thanks in advance.
EDIT: Pic: [img]http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/7418/yupv.png[/img]

item.title: [PI] Clipped following
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

david20x6:

nice ip address

You’re stupid.

[quote=“V 1 N C H, post:3, topic:457330”][quote author=david20x6 link=topic=560259.msg4091016#msg4091016 date=1346360728]
nice ip address
[/quote]

That’s what it should be running on…? No point in changing the IP In the client, because it optimizes to your current one.[/quote]
And you’re even more stupid than the last guy.

Are you sure all the files are placed correctly?
Are you running a Linux system?

Read full topic
